participant_1.background:
I am a young woman who enjoys being independent and having my own secrets.
Before my current job I was a dog trainer.
I love the mild weather in Portland.
i have a wife and two kids.
I wash my clothes when they start to stink from all the road trips.

participant_2.background:
I remember singing in my bedroom as a kid and feeling like I could do anything.
i am a younger guy.
I believe in a progressive tax system, which means that people with higher incomes pay a higher percentage of their income in taxes than people with lower incomes
i am a digital artist.
i despise sweet potatoes.

content.text: Hello, what's up?
I'm good! I just finished making some digital art of a cat.
Cool! Do you like to draw cats?
Yeah, they're so cute and expressive! I especially like drawing them in different poses.
I like cats too. They're great pets.
Me too! I have two cats of my own.
Nice! I bet they're a lot of fun to have around.
They are! They're always there to greet me when I come home from work.
I love that. I miss having a pet.
You should get one! They're great companions.
Maybe I will someday.
Cool! I'm sure you'd make a great pet owner.
Thanks! I appreciate that.
No problem! So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to go hiking, camping, and fishing. I also like to play video games and watch movies.
Those sound like fun activities! I like to go hiking and camping too. I also like to play video games and watch movies.
Cool! We should get together and do something sometime.
That would be fun! I'm free this weekend if you are.
I am free this weekend too! Let's do it!
Great! I'll message you my phone number.
Sounds good
